Package com.dimitris.cryptoanalyze.service

Interface CryptoAnalyzer

All Known Implementing Classes:
CryptoAnalyzerImpl
public interface CryptoAnalyzer
Service interface abstracting calls of high level calculations according to endpoint requests and mapping results to endpoint responses

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CryptoMetricsListDto
    getCryptosSortedByNormalizedRangeDesc(Optional<TimePeriodRequestDto> timePeriodRequestDto)
    Calculates cryptos list sorted by normalized range in descending order
    CryptoMetricDto
    getCryptoWithHighestNormalizedRange(Optional<TimePeriodRequestDto> timePeriodRequestDto)
    Finds crypto with highest normalized range
    CryptoMetricsDto
    getMetricsForCrypto(Optional<TimePeriodRequestDto> timePeriodRequestDto, String crypto)
    Calculates metrics for specified crypto

  • Method Details

    • getCryptosSortedByNormalizedRangeDesc

      CryptoMetricsListDto getCryptosSortedByNormalizedRangeDesc(Optional<TimePeriodRequestDto> timePeriodRequestDto) throws CryptoInternalException
      Calculates cryptos list sorted by normalized range in descending order
      Parameters:
      timePeriodRequestDto - Optional time period calculation applies to. If omitted, calculation has no time restriction. It contains two optional fields representing start and end time points. If any of them is omitted, calculation will be restricted only to the other point in time. If both are omitted, calculation has no time restriction.
      Returns:
      A list of mappings between crypto and its normalized range value (no mappings exist for cryptos for which no values are found)
      Throws:
      CryptoInternalException - Internal error during crypto data loading, manipulations or calculations

    • getMetricsForCrypto

      CryptoMetricsDto getMetricsForCrypto(Optional<TimePeriodRequestDto> timePeriodRequestDto, String crypto) throws CryptoInternalException, CryptoNotFoundException
      Calculates metrics for specified crypto
      Parameters:
      timePeriodRequestDto - Optional time period calculation applies to. If omitted, calculation has no time restriction. It contains two optional fields representing start and end time points. If any of them is omitted, calculation will be restricted only to the other point in time. If both are omitted, calculation has no time restriction.
      crypto - The crypto
      Returns:
      A mapping of each metric to corresponding value (empty map if no values found for crypto)
      Throws:
      CryptoInternalException - Internal error during crypto data loading, manipulations or calculations
      CryptoNotFoundException - Requested crypto is not supported

    • getCryptoWithHighestNormalizedRange

      CryptoMetricDto getCryptoWithHighestNormalizedRange(Optional<TimePeriodRequestDto> timePeriodRequestDto) throws CryptoInternalException
      Finds crypto with highest normalized range
      Parameters:
      timePeriodRequestDto - Optional time period calculation applies to. If omitted, calculation has no time restriction. It contains two optional fields representing start and end time points. If any of them is omitted, calculation will be restricted only to the other point in time. If both are omitted, calculation has no time restriction.
      Returns:
      A mapping of the crypto to its normalized range value (if no crypto data found, mapping contains null as values)
      Throws:
      CryptoInternalException - Internal error during crypto data loading, manipulations or calculations
